Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply and moderating this site. It is clear that it helps many people. Thank you
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed prostate cancer

Posts.Content: 53 yrs old. Psa7.2 Gleason 6. Cancer in 1 of 24 samples less than 5%. I was told it was low grade and low volume but have gotten 3 different opinion...active surveillance, radiation and surgery. Waiting for MRI. Very confusing
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed prostate cancer

Posts.Content: 53 yrs old. Psa7.2 Gleason 6. Cancer in 1 of 24 samples less than 5%. I was told it was low grade and low volume but have gotten 3 different opinion...active surveillance, radiation and surgery. Waiting for MRI. Very confusing
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed prostate cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your replies. I do have a slightly enlarged prostate. My first psa test was done 9 years ago and was 5.8. I have had 4 biopsies since then with the last one being positive. My psa has been checked every six months for the past 9 yrs and has been as low as 2 and as high as my last test of 7.2. I have been on proscar which my doctor says keeps your Psa down.
